      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void buildConditionalMutualInfoMatrix(data.DataSet data) 
      bayes_network.BayesianNetwork buildNetwork(data.DataSet data, java.lang.Integer laplaceCount) 
      private java.lang.Double calculateConditionalMutualInfo(data.attribute.Attribute attr1, data.attribute.Attribute attr2, data.attribute.Attribute classAttr)
      Calculate the conditional mutual information between two attributes conditioned on the class attribute:
      I(X1, X2 | Y)

      Where Y is the class attribute

      Conditional mutual information is calculated as follows:

      Σ y ∈ Y Σ x1 ∈ X1 Σ x2 ∈ X2 P(x1, x2 | y) / ( P(x1 | y) * P(x2 | y) )

      • calculateConditionalMutualInfo

        private java.lang.Double calculateConditionalMutualInfo(data.attribute.Attribute attr1,
                                              data.attribute.Attribute attr2,
                                              data.attribute.Attribute classAttr)
        Calculate the conditional mutual information between two attributes conditioned on the class attribute:
        I(X1, X2 | Y)

        Where Y is the class attribute

        Conditional mutual information is calculated as follows:

        Σ y ∈ Y Σ x1 ∈ X1 Σ x2 ∈ X2 P(x1, x2 | y) / ( P(x1 | y) * P(x2 | y) )
        Parameters:
        attr1 - the first Attribute
        attr2 - the second Attribute
        classAttr - the class Attribute for which the mutual information of the first two attributes are conditioned on
        Returns:
        the conditional mutual information in bits
